shortdesc.ph: Callback when the CDN streaming state changes.
Callback when the CDN streaming state changes.
Callback for changes in CDN streaming state.
Callback for CDN streaming state changes.

p.codeblock: final void Function( DirectCdnStreamingState state, DirectCdnStreamingReason reason, String message)? onDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged;
public virtual void OnDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged(DIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_STATE state, DIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_REASON reason, string message)

section.p: After the host starts streaming directly to the CDN, when the streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the new state, error code, and message. You can use this information to troubleshoot.

After the host starts direct CDN streaming, when the streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the new state, error code, and message. You can use this information to troubleshoot.

After the host starts pushing streams directly to the CDN, when the streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the new state, error code, and message. You can use this information for troubleshooting.

After the host starts pushing the stream directly to the CDN, when the streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the new state, error code, and message. You can use this information to troubleshoot issues.
